RNS Number : 6374VAberdeen Standard Equity Income Tst14 December 2021

ABERDEEN STANDARD EQUITY INCOME TRUST PLC

Legal Entity Identifier (LEI): 21380015XPT7BZISSQ74

Director Declaration - Other Publicly Quoted Directorships

14 December 2021

Pursuant to Listing Rule 9.6.14, Aberdeen Standard Equity Income Trust plc ("the Company") announces that Sarika Patel, who is a non-executive director of the Company, will be appointed as a non-executive director and chair of the Audit & Risk Committee of SDCL Energy Efficiency Income Trust plc with effect from 1 January 2022.

Aberdeen Asset Management PLC

Company Secretary

14 December 2021
